name: UnityRSCLib
tagline: An open source RuneScape Classic library for Unity 4.x
body:
# UnityRSCLib
***

An open source RuneScape Classic library for Unity 4.x

This project aims to help Unity3D developers to create tools or clients for MoparClassic (A RuneScape Classic Server and Client)

At the moment only loading and rendering game objects (Models) are supported.
Model Textures are NOT supported yet.


To use this library, import the scripts, resources and shaders into your Unity Project.

1. Add an empty GameObject to the scene and add the Script Component: RSCModelHandler
This GameObject can be placed anywhere on the scene.

2. Add an empty GameObject to the scene and add the Script Component: RSCModelRenderer
After step #2. Change the settings of the RSCModelRenderer script's "Model Name" parameter to a modelname of choice, eg. **tree** Note: Place this GameObject anywhere you like this model to be rendered and change the Scale if necessary.




Future updates will include:
Landscape Manager (Load, Edit and Save Sections)
And much more, for what I get time to do.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
